name: Scary Stories For Kids 2
description:
Felipe Femur & Friends are back just in time for Halloween! They've come prepared with spooky, never before heard stories that both kids and adults will enjoy. This is the sequel to the 2014 game Campfire Stories For Kids.

This game is currently in development. The demo above has 3 of the planned 20 stories included. Please try it out and let us know any advise or tips you have!

For more information check out felipefemur.com.
